Debian Reference (version 2)

English
HTML (multi files) , UTF-8 plain text (gzipped) , epub , PDF

All files are encoded in UTF-8.

If your favorite language is not found in this list, please install the corresponding debian-reference-* package.

Some browsers may not be setup to read compressed plain text. Use appropriate file viewer system to read them directly from /usr/share/debian-reference. See README for more help and information.
